column4: Hey guys, Im running ubuntu at my house at home, and I SSH to it with putty from my laptop at school, how can I launch GUI applications on the ubuntu computer at home on an xsession that I know is running?
you have several options...you can use vnc, do X forwarding through ssh, or use NX
if you want to use X forwarding in windows you are going to have to run Xming at the same time
check searcher.myvnc.com/geek...I have some notes about remote access
